name: Event Registration App
description: Quickly deploy a new Web App that let's people register for your event!

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate && echo "from django.contrib.auth.models import User; User.objects.create_superuser('adminuser', 'admin@eventregistrationapp.com', 'admin001')" | python manage.py shell

RECAPTCHA_SECRET_KEY.description: Create a recaptcha code and use it here
RECAPTCHA_SECRET_KEY.value: replace this with your real recaptcha code

SENDGRID_KEY.description: Go get a SendGrid API Key for this!
